_header: Were I a clerk then would I say you grace
_description: Charles d’Orléans, Petitions to Cupid — ten stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar682.First Lines:
Were y a clerk then wold y say yow graceBut certis then ageynward am
                    y noon…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…As wel forto acheven yowre empriseAnd at yowre ende the
                    blisse of paradise
